page.title: 04Aberford School Diary 1984/5
page.content: {June}- a residential visit was made by classJ2 to Haworth.During the visit there were visits to Top Withens, the Bronte Parsonage, Cliffe Castle and the Peter Black car museum in Keighley {November}- Halloween was a busy time at school and at the disco best costume prizes were won by Alan Foxcroft and Kathryn Reed. {April}- Film Night was a great time when 100 children and parents enjoyed the cartoon film CHARLOTTE'S WEB. {MAY}- We had a visit from the Q20 Theatre Company who performed BAUBLES AND BEADS.The 1985 Gala Queen, Joanna Oddy was chosen with attendants Sara Baxter,Charlotte Turner,Sarah Noble, Paula Fletcher and Claire Hind. {July}-Class 4 spent a week hill walking and caving at Ingleborough Hall at Clapham in the Yorkshire Dales.
